data.title: Regent University: Admissions Statistics (2023-24 AY)
data.meta_description: Regent University admissions data for the most recent entering class. The JD program has a total enrollment of 332 students. With an acceptance rate of 40.9%, they welcomed 112 new 1Ls in 2023 with a median LSAT of 157, and median GPA of 3.68.
